body:
SELECT   a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0012]/value as dv_date_time,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0013]/value as dv_time,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0014]/value as dv_date
        FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c
  CONTAINS (OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.supported_data_types.v0])
            LIMIT 1
        ORDER BY c /context/start_time/ value DESC
